title: Arcade ARAM Map - Howling Abyss / Butchers Bridge
body:
http://s.lolstatic.com/site/skins-arcade/37aef2f0e4451bb4288f2a1927d389889b16d56c/images/extras/wallpaper/Arcade_Art_3840x1080.jpg

I'll get straight to the point. Riot needs, and I really mean this, NEEDS to make an ARAM map for the Arcade Theme just like Butchers Bridge.
----------------
"What's a Butchers Bridge?" I may hear some of you say. That's okay. It was a part of the Burning Tides event with {{champion:41}} vs {{champion:21}}  as well as the new Bilgewater lore update and skin set. Riot did an entire new map for ARAM.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y3fGYandWds
-----------------------------
Pretty cool right? Now picture Arcade. Cant imagine it? Here's some things to help:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eBtmQ9bCkQQ

I can see it now, the colours, the lights, the bit sfx!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BO3XLE_eRPk

One side good and the other evil. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IxvG6RLeVVk
---------------------
https://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/a/ae/The_Final_Boss_approaches.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/640?cb=20140811215139

Now Riot you have 1/3 the assets done already! The Summoners Rift looks cool, but picture the Bridge as an Arcade arena. One side green and lush like a town and the other side a dark and menacing tower.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vCz2d6ZGJg4
